## v1.2.0
- [New] support comments (#37)
- [Refactor] Use template and types from the babel object (#32)
- [Tests] on `node` `v9`; pin included builds to LTS

## v1.1.0

- [Tests] on `node` `v8`
- [Tests] use `nvm install-latest-npm` so newer npm doesnâ€™t break older node
